title: 'World-first' gonorrhoea vaccine rolled out from today, with UK infections hitting a record high
description: Gonorrhoea diagnoses reached 85,000 in 2023, the highest since records began in 1918 and three times more than in 2012.diagnoses reached 85,000 in 2023, the highest since records began in 1918 and three times more than in 2012.
content:
The NHS will start rolling out a "world-first" vaccination programme against gonorrhoea in England today.

title: UK weather: Storm Floris sparks amber warning - with trains cancelled
description: Train operator LNER has warned passengers not to travel north of Newcastle due to Storm Floris, while Avanti West Coast has advised its customers not to travel north of Preston as it will be "heavily affected" by the weather.
content:
Storm Floris is nearing the UK - with train companies in the hardest-hit areas urging passengers not to travel today.
The Met Office has issued an amber "danger to life" warning for wind in parts of Scotland, with gusts of up to 90mph possible.
That ... [3129 chars]

title: Singapore: Tycoon Ong Beng Seng pleads guilty in corruption case
description: Ong had given expensive gifts to a former minister, including F1 tickets and a private jet ride.
content:
At Iswaran's sentencing last October, the court heard that Iswaran requested Ong bill him for a business class flight from Doha to Singapore, after he discovered that he could have been implicated while police were investigating a separate incident.

title: Gonorrhoea vaccine roll-out begins across the UK
description: Doctors say the jabs could save the NHS millions of pounds over the next decade.
content:
Gonorrhoea is a bacterial infection that is transmitted through unprotected sex.
Symptoms can include pain, unusual discharge, inflammation of the genitals and infertility, but in some cases it can have no symptoms at all.
